>
[Sovereign Steel Armor](/Equipment.aspx?ID=777)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Legends](/Sources.aspx?ID=40) pg. 77</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn armor

**Bulk**  varies by armor
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

**Base Material** [Sovereign Steel](/Equipment.aspx?ID=776)

</column>

---

Sovereign steel armor sickens certain creatures that touch it. A creature with weakness to [cold iron](/Equipment.aspx?ID=272) that critically fails an unarmed attack against a creature in sovereign steel armor becomes [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34), and such a creature is sickened 1 as long as it wears sovereign steel armor. The [noqual](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1419) in sovereign steel armor provides protection against magic, granting you a +1 circumstance bonus to AC against spell attack rolls. If you Cast a Spell while wearing sovereign steel armor, you must succeed at a DC 5 flat check or the spell fails.
